column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown on the bridge.  Three vehicle injury collision.  Large amount of oil reportedly on the roadway.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: All traffic diverted to the exit ramp to Richmond Rd.  Traffic is backed up to Tates Creek Rd at this time.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: UPDATE 5:01 p.m. - Clear.  Both lanes now open.  Traffic remains backed up.
